VUPShionMod:DimensionSplitterAria.NAME: Dimension Splitter: Aria
VUPShionMod:DimensionSplitterAria.FLAVOR: “Your existence is futile.” says the otherworldly light portends impending destruction.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, deal #b%d ( #b2 + #yUpgrade x3) damage to a random enemy. If #yFatal, repeats and gain [E] . NL It is upgraded whenever you enter the next Act. NL Current Upgrade: #b%d.
Space-based Weapon Preloading in Act 1... NL

VUPShionMod:KuroisuDetermination.NAME: Cloyce's Determination
VUPShionMod:KuroisuDetermination.FLAVOR: Future is a scattering illusion of time that is not ours to foretell. Push through with determination, and this is all we can do.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yRight #yClick: Take an extra turn after this turn, end your turn. (works #b%d times)
This relic has been exhausted.

VUPShionMod:Croissant.NAME: Croissant
VUPShionMod:Croissant.FLAVOR: You just won't bother to notice the void of something on your friend's head, will you?
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, heal #b30 HP.

VUPShionMod:OpticalCamouflage.NAME: Optical Camouflage
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b1 #yIntangible.

VUPShionMod:Sniperscope.NAME: Sniperscope
VUPShionMod:Sniperscope.FLAVOR: Heard the ticking of your remaining time? Fear not, it will be quick, it will not hurt.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply #b1 #yVulnerable to the enemy with the least HP. NL Enemies with #yVulnerable take #b75% more damage rather than #b50%.

VUPShionMod:AnastasiaNecklace.NAME: Anastasia Droplet
VUPShionMod:AnastasiaNecklace.FLAVOR: Within which all the power beyond your wield is concentrated.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #yBarricade.
Gain #b200 Max HP. NL Gain #b200 #yBlock at the start of your turn. NL Start each combat with #yBarricade. NL Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
NL ALL #yFunnels are upgraded by #b9. NL #yFunnels now hit ALL enemies. NL Whenever an enemy dies, transfer any #yPursued it has to a random enemy.
Anastasia Droplet(Awakened)

VUPShionMod:Nebula.NAME: Nebula
VUPShionMod:Nebula.FLAVOR: Universal type of support equipment from Anastasia, includes elementary thrusters and energy shields.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b3 #yBlock. Lose #b1 #yStiffness each turn.

VUPShionMod:Protostar.NAME: Protostar
VUPShionMod:Protostar.FLAVOR: Improved model of Nebula with greater thruster power and extra magia barrier generators.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b2 #yBuffer. Lose #b2 #yStiffness each turn.

VUPShionMod:TrackingBeacon.NAME: Tracking Beacon
DESCRIPTIONS: Coordinates have been sent out to your comrades.

VUPShionMod:BlueGiant.NAME: Blue Giant
VUPShionMod:BlueGiant.FLAVOR: Potent ranged firepower in exchange of mobility.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, lose [E] and add 1 #yFunnel #yMatrix into your hand.

VUPShionMod:DarkStar.NAME: Dark Star
VUPShionMod:DarkStar.FLAVOR: Additionally modulized Magia trigger devices, installed with your friend's assistance.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add 1 #yTonitrus #yRapidus into your hand. Combat reward screens now contain cards from universial #yCodex.

VUPShionMod:StarQuakes.NAME: Starquake
VUPShionMod:StarQuakes.FLAVOR: Universal type of support equipment from Anastasia, tachi blade driven by magia.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an #yAttack, gain #b2 #yCor #yGladii. At the end of your turn, lose #b33% of #yCor #yGladii.

VUPShionMod:StarBreaker.NAME: Star Breaker
VUPShionMod:StarBreaker.FLAVOR: Based on the Starquake, the energy constraint is upgraded, which greatly reduces the magic energy dissipation
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an #yAttack, gain #b4 #yCor #yGladii. At the end of your turn, lose #b15% of #yCor #yGladii.

VUPShionMod:BlueSupergiant.NAME: Blue Supergiant
VUPShionMod:BlueSupergiant.FLAVOR: Improved model of the Blue Giant that manifests an enhanced level of output.
DESCRIPTIONS: #rReplace Blue Giant. NL At the start of your turn, add a #yFunnel #yMatrix into your hand.

VUPShionMod:PureHeart.NAME: Prototype: Pure Heart
VUPShionMod:PureHeart.FLAVOR: Specialized type of support equipment from Anastasia, powerful blade cumbered by excessive magia that surges within.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, gain #b5 #yCod #yGladii. At the end of your turn, lose #b50% of #yCor #yGladii.

VUPShionMod:WhitePurity.NAME: Prototype: White Purity
VUPShionMod:WhitePurity.FLAVOR: Improved model of Prototype: Pure Heart that is installed with a modified energy inhibitor.
DESCRIPTIONS: #rReplace Prototype: Pure Heart. NL Whenever you play a card, gain #b5 #yCod #yGladii. At the end of your turn, lose #b33% of #yCor #yGladii.

VUPShionMod:SapphireRoseNecklace.NAME: Sapphire Rose Necklace
VUPShionMod:SapphireRoseNecklace.FLAVOR: A simply embellished, discreet pendant. Every passing moment of the past in eyes of the sisters has been recorded and engraved in the soul dwelling within.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat, gain #b2 Max HP.

VUPShionMod:MartyrVessel.NAME: Martyr Vessel
VUPShionMod:MartyrVessel.FLAVOR: The weapon weighs heavily with things which commons can not afford to bear, but yet beaconed a trail throughout the maid's life.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat,Enter #yPraying #yStance .

VUPShionMod:HallowedCase.NAME: Hallowed Case
VUPShionMod:HallowedCase.FLAVOR: Blaze. Blaze. Blaze is shed in confronting greater misery.
DESCRIPTIONS: #rReplace Martyr Vessel. NL #yPraying #yStance: At the end of your turn, heal #b2 HP and gain #b2 #yWeak. NL Upon entering #yJudging #yStance, remove #yWeak and gain #b1 #yCommune at the start of every turn.

VUPShionMod:TheRipple.NAME: Support System: The Ripple
VUPShionMod:TheRipple.FLAVOR: Individual teleporting equipment that greatly supplements mobility, somehow fabricated in a shape of swimming costume. (Incidence of risks occur due to discrepant universe parameters.)
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, shuffle #b2 #yVoid into your draw pile. NL Start each combat with #b2 #yDexterity. NL At the start of your turn, gain #yFrail.

VUPShionMod:PlacidAqua.NAME: Support System: Placid Aqua
VUPShionMod:PlacidAqua.FLAVOR: Incidence of risks is now mostly averted for the local data gathered.
DESCRIPTIONS: #rReplace Support System: The Ripple. NL Start each combat with #b3 #yDexterity. NL At the start of your turn, gain #yFrail.

VUPShionMod:Drapery.NAME: Overloaded Supernova
VUPShionMod:Drapery.FLAVOR: Experimental overload protector that can overload all equipments for a short period of time, somehow fabricated in a shape of swimming costume.（Incidence of risks occur due to excessive energy draining.）
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, shuffle #b2 #yDazed into draw pile. At the start of each turn ,gain 1 #yFrail. Right Click: #bSupernova #bOutburst. (once per combat)
Supernova
NL NL #bSupernova #bOutburst: NL Gain #b1 #yIntangible. NL Fire all #yFunnels #b2 times. NL Enhance random #b2 #yFunnels. NL End your turn.

VUPShionMod:Parocheth.NAME: Supernova
VUPShionMod:Parocheth.FLAVOR: Zero point energy capacitor is implanted to alleviate burden of the equiper.
DESCRIPTIONS: #rReplace Overloaded Supernova. NL Right Click: #bSupernova #bOutburst. (once per combat)
Supernova
NL NL #bSupernova #bOutburst: NL Gain #b1 #yIntangible. NL Fire all #yFunnels #b2 times. NL Enhance random #b2 #yFunnels. NL End your turn.

VUPShionMod:AbyssalCrux.NAME: Abyssal Crux
VUPShionMod:AbyssalCrux.FLAVOR: It is not her standing in front of her, not any longer.
DESCRIPTIONS: You can no longer #yrest at rest sites. NL Whenever you lose HP during combat, heal HP twice as much.
Reversed Crux of Abyss
She is the container that Abyss loves most among all others, even willing to keep her sane. NL ...But the price is paid with the permanent suffering upon everything she cherishes.
Any damage received is converted into HP loss. NL At the end of your turn, lose #b500 HP and Max HP. NL Whenever you lose HP, deal equal damage to ALL enemies.

VUPShionMod:Inhibitor.NAME: Inhibitor Prototype 03
VUPShionMod:Inhibitor.FLAVOR: In the endless, stifling, dark corridor, it marks the starting point of the line.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose Sanity, lose #b1 less.

VUPShionMod:FragmentsOfFaith.NAME: Fragments of Faith
VUPShionMod:FragmentsOfFaith.FLAVOR: The line is reversed. NL Hope you may see what is true.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each combat, gain #b5 Max HP. NL Upon entering Stage 3, it is converted into #yHalo #yof #yFaith.
Halo of Faith
Spirits sing, dreams realize. NL Cut the line, it is time.
At the end of your turn, heal HP to your Max HP. NL Whenever you heal HP, deal equal damage to ALL enemies. NL Whenever you receive damage from enemy attacks, gain #b3 Max HP.

VUPShionMod:WaveSlasher.NAME: Wave Slasher
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #ySkill, lose #b1 #yStiffness. NL The first #yAttack played each turn costs #b0. NL Lose #b50% #yCor #yGladii each turn.

VUPShionMod:WaveBreaker.NAME: Wave Breaker
VUPShionMod:WaveBreaker.FLAVOR: Subspace stabilizer is implanted to add stability.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #ySkill, lose #b2 #yStiffness. NL The first #yAttack played each turn costs #b0. NL Lose #b15% #yCor #yGladii each turn.

VUPShionMod:WhiteRose.NAME: White Rose
VUPShionMod:WhiteRose.FLAVOR: Universal support equipment from Anastasia, analyzing module is implanted to tackle threats.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever attacked, gain #b1 #yPlated #yArmor.

VUPShionMod:PurityWhiteRose.NAME: Stainless Rose
VUPShionMod:PurityWhiteRose.FLAVOR: AI module is implanted to improve analyzing performance.
DESCRIPTIONS: #rReplace White Rose. NL Whenever you receive damage from enemy #yattacks, gain #b2 #yPlated #yArmor.

VUPShionMod:ConcordSnipe.NAME: Concord: Snipe
VUPShionMod:ConcordSnipe.FLAVOR: Leg-wearing gear that corrdinates parameters among universes to promote environmental adaptability.
DESCRIPTIONS: Each turn your first #yAttack deals twice damage. NL #bTime&Space #bSynchro. #bMatrix #bSynchro .
Time&Space Synchro
Your damage decreases #b%d%%, NL Damage received increase by #b%d%%. NL Decrease this effect for each floor climbed by #b1%% .
Your damage increases #b%d%%, NL Damage received decrease by #b%d%%. NL Decrease this effect for each floor climbed by NL （#b50%% Maximum）
Matrix Synchro
For every funnel level at #b5 , gain #b1 #y HyperdimentionalLink at each of your turn.

VUPShionMod:ConcordArray.NAME: Concord: Array
VUPShionMod:ConcordArray.FLAVOR: Leg-wearing gear that corrdinates parameters among universes to promote environmental adaptability.
DESCRIPTIONS: All #yfunnel upgrades by #b1. NL #bTime&Space #bSynchro. #bMatrix #bSynchro .
Time&Space Synchro
Your damage decreases by #b%d%%, NL Damage received increases by #b%d%%. NL Decrease this effect for each floor climbed by #b1%% .
Your damage increases by #b%d%%, NL Damage received decreases by #b%d%%. NL Decrease this effect for each floor climbed by NL （#b50%% Maximum）
Matrix Synchro
For every funnel level at #b5 , gain #b1 #y HyperdimentionalLink at each of your turn.

VUPShionMod:ConcordCharge.NAME: Concord: Recharge
VUPShionMod:ConcordCharge.FLAVOR: Leg-wearing gear that corrdinates parameters among universes to promote environmental adaptability.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain [E] [E]. NL #bTime&Space #bSynchro. #bMatrix #bSynchro .
Time&Space Synchro
Your damage decreases by #b%d%%, NL Damage received increases by #b%d%%. NL Decrease this effect for each floor climbed by #b1%% .
Your damage increases by #b%d%%, NL Damage received decreases by #b%d%%. NL Decrease this effect for each floor climbed by NL （#b50%% Maximum）
Matrix Synchro
For every funnel level at #b5 , gain #b1 #y HyperdimentionalLink at each of your turn.

VUPShionMod:FruitCake.NAME: Fruit Cake
VUPShionMod:FruitCake.FLAVOR: The stall... What on earth is wrong with it?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn,if your HP is at or above 50%,gain [E] . NL Otherwise,no longer works in this combat.

VUPShionMod:PrototypeCup.NAME: Prototype: Empty Goblet
VUPShionMod:PrototypeCup.FLAVOR: Semi-permanent energy source that linked to your inner Magia circuit. It damages acting faculty in exchange of enormous output of Magia.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, lose [E]. NL At the end of your turn, lose #b5 #yMagiam #yObruor.

VUPShionMod:MagiaCup.NAME: Vacuum Goblet
VUPShionMod:MagiaCup.FLAVOR: The structure of peripheral Magia circuit has been optimized for the body to suit.
DESCRIPTIONS: #rReplace Prototype: Empty Goblet. NL At the end of your turn, lose #b5 #yMagiam #Obruor.

VUPShionMod:MagiaSwordRed.NAME: Magia Sword: Danyingke
VUPShionMod:MagiaSwordRed.FLAVOR: Magia-driven armament in the form of a flying sword that demands massive magia to motivate, but it frees your hand of the hilt.
DESCRIPTIONS: You no longer gain #yStiffness. NL Whenever you play an #yAttack, gain 1 #yMagiam #yObruor. NL Whenever you deal damage with #yAttacks, deal #b4 #yNon-attack damage to a random enemy. NL Lose half of your #yCor #yGladii each turn.

VUPShionMod:MagiaSwordRuby.NAME: Magia Sword: Zhushazhui
VUPShionMod:MagiaSwordRuby.FLAVOR: Improved model of Magia Sword: Danyingke to specialize in dealing damage at the cost of more Magia consumption.
DESCRIPTIONS: #rReplace Magia Sword: Danyingke. NL You no longer gain #yStiffness. NL Whenever you play an #yAttack, gain 1 #yMagiam #yObruor and play it for 1 additional time. NL Lose half of your #yCor #yGladii each turn.

VUPShionMod:TrainingScabbard.NAME: 训练用剑鞘
VUPShionMod:TrainingScabbard.FLAVOR: Anastasia训练场的装备，为什么会在这里？
DESCRIPTIONS: #y精英 或 #y首领 战后，随机 #y升级 牌组中的一张攻击牌。

VUPShionMod:TrainingLightsaber.NAME: 训练用光剑
VUPShionMod:TrainingLightsaber.FLAVOR: Anastasia训练场的装备，为什么会在这里？
DESCRIPTIONS: 每场战斗开始时, #y力量 #b%s 。 #y精英 或 #y首领 战后，将效果 #b+1 。

VUPShionMod:TrainingPropeller.NAME: 训练用推进器
VUPShionMod:TrainingPropeller.FLAVOR: Anastasia训练场的装备，为什么会在这里？
DESCRIPTIONS: 每场战斗开始时, #y敏捷 #b%s 。 #y精英 或 #y首领 战后，将效果 #b+1 。

VUPShionMod:FishingRod.NAME: 钓鱼佬的竿
VUPShionMod:FishingRod.FLAVOR: 似乎是某人的钓鱼竿，但年代看上去很久远了。
DESCRIPTIONS: 进入 #y休息处 时，随机获得 #b0-2 瓶药水。

VUPShionMod:PodBot.NAME: 快乐的pod机器人
VUPShionMod:PodBot.FLAVOR: Anastasia仿制的微型辅助机器人，为什么会在这里？
DESCRIPTIONS: 每回合开始时给予随机一名敌人 #b1 层 #y虚弱 。

VUPShionMod:OldFinFunnel.NAME: 老旧的浮游炮
VUPShionMod:OldFinFunnel.FLAVOR: 应该是紫音的浮游炮，但看上去似乎很旧了。
DESCRIPTIONS: 每回合开始时，对随机敌人造成 #b4 ，获得 #b4 点 #y格挡 。

VUPShionMod:DragonScales.NAME: 龙龙的旧鳞
VUPShionMod:DragonScales.FLAVOR: 似乎是龙龙的鳞片，但年代看上去很久远了。
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当你在战斗中失去生命，获得 #b3 点 #y格挡 。

VUPShionMod:WingsClergy.NAME: 圣职者的残翼
VUPShionMod:WingsClergy.FLAVOR: 似乎是蓝蓝的翅膀的一部分，但看上去似乎很旧了。
DESCRIPTIONS: 每场战斗开始时，获得 #b3 层 #y再生 。

VUPShionMod:OldOmamori.NAME: 老旧的全新御守
VUPShionMod:OldOmamori.FLAVOR: 背面写着：“这次不会卡二了，大概”。似乎是龙龙的笔迹。
DESCRIPTIONS: 拾起时，移除 #b2 张初始攻击牌。

VUPShionMod:BlankMap.NAME: 老旧的空白地图
VUPShionMod:BlankMap.FLAVOR: 背面写着：“我们需要更多的，变数”。似乎是龙龙的笔迹。
DESCRIPTIONS: 进入问号房时，获得 #b18 金币。

VUPShionMod:CombatNotes.NAME: 小棉的战斗笔记
VUPShionMod:CombatNotes.FLAVOR: 似乎是小棉的笔迹，记录了各种常见怪物。但看上去似乎很旧了 。
DESCRIPTIONS: 在普通战斗中，每回合开始时获得 [E] 。

VUPShionMod:AttackCircuit.NAME: 植入型攻击回路
VUPShionMod:AttackCircuit.FLAVOR: Anastasia特化改造组件，为什么会在这里？
DESCRIPTIONS: 拾起时，选择移除一张 #y攻击牌 。 NL 在每场战斗开始时，打出这张牌的复制。
每场战斗开始时将 #y%s 打出。
选择一张攻击牌在战斗开始时打出

VUPShionMod:TotipotentCircuit.NAME: 植入型全能回路
VUPShionMod:TotipotentCircuit.FLAVOR: Anastasia进阶改造组件，为什么会在这里？
DESCRIPTIONS: 拾起时，选择移除一张牌。 NL 在每场战斗开始时，打出这张牌的复制。
每场战斗开始时将 #y%s 打出。
选择一张牌在战斗开始时打出

VUPShionMod:MedicalCollar.NAME: 应急医疗项圈
VUPShionMod:MedicalCollar.FLAVOR: Anastasia训练场的装备，为什么会在这里？
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当抽到 #y状态 或 #y诅咒 牌时，抽一张牌。

VUPShionMod:CardRecorder.NAME: 怀表型记牌器
VUPShionMod:CardRecorder.FLAVOR: 指针似乎在乱动，应该是坏掉了。
DESCRIPTIONS: 若你在某个回合打出的牌大于等于 #b6 张，则在你的下个回合开始时额外抽 #b3 张牌。

VUPShionMod:Memento.NAME: 扭曲的记忆碎片
VUPShionMod:Memento.FLAVOR: 似乎是祈言凝结的实体，但是被某种意志扭曲成了难以理解的结构。
DESCRIPTIONS: 每回合开始时获得 [E] , 失去 #b2 点生命。

VUPShionMod:TimeConfetti.NAME: 扭曲的时间碎片
VUPShionMod:TimeConfetti.FLAVOR: 似乎包含了龙龙的力量，但是被某种意志扭曲成了难以理解的结构。
DESCRIPTIONS: 每回合开始时失去 [E] 。 每场战斗开始时获得 #y回响形态 。

VUPShionMod:BladeFragment.NAME: 扭曲的剑刃碎片
VUPShionMod:BladeFragment.FLAVOR: 似乎在散发着剑意力量，但是被某种意志扭曲成了难以理解的结构。
DESCRIPTIONS: 每场战斗开始时失去 [E] [E] [E] 。 NL 每场战斗开始时打出并 #y消耗 你牌组中的所有基础攻击和防御牌。
